page.title: 17THE VICAR'S DAY (1st part)
page.content: Rise at 6am,earlier in summer if wanting to catch a trout from the River Lynher.Breakfast over by 8am in order to listen to radio news & await any emergency phone calls.eg undertaker. Study between 8 & 11 for sermonising, arranging services,answering post.The telephone rings regularly with messages,problems or arrangements to be made, funerals,baptism or official forms to be endorsed,there being no resident J.P.to carry out this legal function. On Thursday,teach R.E.to top class in local{Primary School } Lunch is 'snack affair' watching 1pm news on the television. Afternoons are visiting times.Visit the sick,aged or troubled,together with casual visits to parishoners.
